Module com.example.checkers
Package com.example.checkers.game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.checkers.game.Board
public class Board extends Object
Class responsible for managing the game board

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Piece[][]
    pieces
    Pieces placed on the board and used throughout the game
    protected final int
    size
    Describes how many squares the board has in both direction: effectively the board's shape is size x size It is set only once during creation of object

  • Field Details

    • size

      protected final int size
      Describes how many squares the board has in both direction: effectively the board's shape is size x size It is set only once during creation of object

    • pieces

      protected Piece[][] pieces
      Pieces placed on the board and used throughout the game

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Gets the size of the game board
      Returns:
      Board size

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(int x, int y)
      Gets the piece from given board coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate
      y - coordinate
      Returns:
      piece object at (x,y)

    • addPiece

      public void addPiece(int x, int y, Color color, Type type)
      Places the piece on the board at given coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - piece's coordinate
      y - piece's coordinate
      color - piece's color (WHITE / BLACK)
      type - piece's type (MAN / KING)

    • removePiece

      public void removePiece(int x, int y)
      Removes the piece from the game board
      Parameters:
      x - piece's coordinate
      y - piece's coordinate

    • getBoardState

      public String getBoardState()
      Gets the board state in form of the String
      Example:
      "WM 00 WM 00 00 00 BM 00..."
      W - white piece
      B - black piece
      M - man
      K - king
      00 - no piece at all
      Returns:
      String representation of the board state, column by column
